name: Theta Technolabs
tagline: We Make Things Which Help You To Make Things
description:
Theta Technolabs is a team of enthusiastic, dedicated and Professional Mobile & Web application developers. The developers who work at Theta Technolabs have been working in this IT sphere more than 6 years. 
 
We believe in giving quality work in quick time & commitment to meet the deadlines. We give attention to all our clients and ensure that the client will get what they are looking for from us as good developers. We also are always trying to give a complete solution for all our clients. 
 
Our Services:
Deployment services
Development Services
Enterprise solution
Product Re-engineering
